name: website-playwright

scripts.atodev: cross-env TEST_ENV=atodev npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"
scripts.atoqa: cross-env TEST_ENV=atoqa npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"
scripts.hotfixdev: cross-env TEST_ENV=hotfixdev npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"
scripts.hotfixqa: cross-env TEST_ENV=hotfixqa npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"
scripts.uat: cross-env TEST_ENV=uat npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"

Comment: //browsers available chromium firefox webkit "Microsoft Edge" "Google Chrome"
